typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'query',
	store: 'sqlserver',
	query: 'SELECT Name,Last_Name FROM [SalesLT].[Test_Excel]',
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED') ~> sourceazure
sourceazure sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
